document_data.name: Temple of the Morninglord
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of the Morninglord''' was a temple to [[Lathander]], the Morninglord, situated in the city of [[Elturel]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relics: The temple housed the ''[[amulet of the Dawnbreaker]]'', a magical relic made from a fragment of the skull of the [[Dawnbreaker]], a prophet of Lathander, and wrapped in metals.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1366}}, the master thief [[Janol Famisso|"Pinch"]] stole the ''amulet of the Dawnbreaker'' from the Temple of the Morninglord. The young priestess [[Lissa]] was sent to track down Pinch and his band, following them to [[Ankhapur]], but he convinced her he'd taken it from other thieves, deserved a reward, and even should hang on to it for safekeeping.
